description:
The Phantom Knight is sure that he`s won when the sees the Needle Sphere Form break. But Hibari from ten years earlier appears from the smoke! The Phantom Knight cannot hide his confusion at the unexpected turn of events. Was this the schedule that Hibari from the future talked about during the battle? Hibari from the past doesn`t seem to understand the situation, but when he finds Yamamoto and learns the Phantom Knight is responsible for what has happened to him, he`s ready to punish the Phantom Knight with his tonfa!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Entre le chef du comité de discipline
